Frank Ward (born 23 July 1930) is an Irish retired cyclist. He won the R치s Tailteann in 1957.
Early life
Ward is a native of Dublin.
Career
Ward won the Junior Men's race at the 1952 Irish National Cycling Championships.
Ward was second in the 1956 R치s and won it in 1957. That year, he also won three stages (of eight) and was on the winning Dublin team. He also won the 1957 R치s Cathal Brugha.
